page.title: 03Pastimes & Interests
page.content: Glass Blown and ceramic figures made and sold in the craftsman's own shop. Soft toy and lace making at home. Women's Institute. Young Wives Club. Youth clubs, cricket, tennis and dance clubs.A club for Physically Handicap'd Country and beach walks,in particular the N.devon Coast Path. Gardening, horse riding,tennis,golf,sea angling, badminton,surfing and wind surfing. Sand sailing,snooker,darts & sequence dancing. While these activites attract many visitors they are an integral part of the life of the residents. The Holy Trinity Church,Anglican, shares in the team ministry with Northam and Appledore. In summer months the Holy Trinity church is used by Roman Catholics in the evenings. The Baptist Chapel has its own minister. There is a Beach Mission held regularly in the summer.
